channel.title: Patch Package :: Go Kure
channel.description: Patch Package Documentation The patch package implements a powerful JSONPath-based declarative patching system for Kubernetes resources. It allows you to modify resources while preserving YAML structure, comments, and formatting. Documentation Patch File Format Specification Complete specification of the .kpatch file format, including: Syntax and structure Scope selection Operation types Examples and best practices Patch Engine Design Technical design documentation covering: Architecture overview Processing pipeline Implementation details Performance considerations Path Resolution Detailed explanation of how paths are resolved:
